text: Luis Guzmán (born August 28, 1956) is a Puerto Rican actor. He starred in Steven Soderbergh's movies, Out of Sight, The Limey and Traffic. He also starred in Paul Thomas Anderson's movies, Boogie Nights, Magnolia and Punch- Drunk Love. He starred in the HBO original series How to Make It in America and the Netflix series Narcos. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Puerto Rican movie actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:Actors from Vermont Category:Comedians from New York City Category:Comedians from Vermont Category:Puerto Rican voice actors Category:Puerto Rican television actors Category:Puerto Rican comedians
title: Luis Guzmán
